    • documentToObject

      public static <T> T documentToObject​(org.bson.Document document, java.lang.Class objectClass)
      Return a {object of generic type T} that where casted from input document the fields in the object which not exist in the document will have initial value
      Parameters:
      document - - the document needed to cast.
      objectClass - - the class of the object needed to be transfer to
      Returns:
      cipher text as String.

    • objectToDocument

      Parameters:
      object - the object needed to be cast
      Returns:
